idea-plugin.name: Service Invocation Monitor
idea-plugin.description:
A link monitoring plug-in, you can monitor Junit, SpringBoot Invocation chain, statistics interface method time.
github：https://github.com/caijianying/Service-invocation-monitor
idea-plugin.change-notes:
V1.0.0

  • Support monitoring junit use cases
  • Support SpringBoot application monitoring
  • Monitoring indicator: The time of the trace link
